Squirrellink [i](Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to create that many 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.)[/i]
When Squirrel Girl enters, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
{2}{G}: Squirrel Girl gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Activate only outside of combat
